UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Artificial beta-defensin based on a minimal defensin template.
Literature.Author: Antcheva N, Morgera F, Creatti L, Vaccari L, Pag U, Pacor S, Shai Y, Sahl HG, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus aureus 710A(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans(MIC=2µM),Burkholderia cepacia(MIC=>32µM)
